scripts.prestart: npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && npm run apidoc && npm run db:seed
scripts.start: npm run prestart && cross-env nodemon --watch src -L --verbose --exec "node --watch -r dotenv/config -r ts-node/register src/index.ts"
scripts.test: npm run prestart && npm run db:push && mocha -r dotenv/config -r ts-node/register --config .mocharc.js
scripts.docker:dev: docker compose  --env-file .env.dev --profile dev up -d && docker attach dev_app
scripts.docker:test: docker compose --env-file .env.test --profile test up -d && docker attach test_app
scripts.local:dev: npm run local:prestart:dev && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local.dev nodemon --watch src -L  --verbose --exec "node --watch -r dotenv/config -r ts-node/register src/index.ts"
scripts.local:test: npm run local:prestart:test && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local.test mocha -r dotenv/config -r ts-node/register --config .mocharc.js
scripts.local:prestart:dev: npx prisma generate && POSTGRES_URL=postgresql://admin:postgres@localhost:54321/development npx prisma db push && npm run apidoc
scripts.local:prestart:test: npx prisma generate && POSTGRES_URL=postgresql://test:test@localhost:54322/test npx prisma db push && npm run apidoc
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: tsc && sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org null-a63 --project node-express ./dist && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org null-a63 --project node-express ./dist
